svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-12-29T07:31:17.107Z" agent="5.0 (Windows)" etag="zxUWlg-1_yeY-FoGu8UW" version="14.0.4" type="github"><diagram id="GMeN-6a-g62HSw9PUOVw" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 133px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 230px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #B3B3B3; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

p.span: Since development cycles are shortened, a microservices architecture supports more agile deployment and updates.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 133px; margin-left: 245px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 230px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

p.span: As demand for certain services grows, you can deploy across multiple servers, and infrastructures, to meet your needs.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 133px; margin-left: 485px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 230px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

span.span: These independent services, when constructed properly, do not impact one another. This means that if one piece fails, the whole app doesn’t go down, unlike the monolithic app model.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 513px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 280px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

span.span: Because your microservice-based apps are more modular and smaller than traditional, monolithic apps, the worries that came with those deployments are negated. This requires more coordination, which a service mesh layer can help with, but the payoffs can be huge.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 513px; margin-left: 245px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 280px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; color: rgb(0 , 0 , 0) ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

p.span: Because the larger app is broken down into smaller pieces, developers can more easily understand, update, and enhance those pieces, resulting in faster development cycles, especially when combined with agile development methodologies.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 192px; height: 1px; padding-top: 513px; margin-left: 485px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 280px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #B3B3B3; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt ; font-family: "arial" ; background-color: transparent ; font-weight: 400 ; font-style: normal ; font-variant: normal ; text-decoration: none ; vertical-align: baseline

p.span: Due to the use of polyglot APIs, developers have the freedom to choose the best language and technology for the necessary function.

p.span: As demand for certain services grows, you can deploy across multiple servers, and infrastructures, to meet your needs.

span.span: These independent services, when constructed properly, do not impact one another. This means that if one piece fails, the whole app doesn’t go down, unlike the monolithic app model.

p.span: Because the larger app is broken down into smaller pieces, developers can more easily understand, update, and enhance those pieces, resulting in faster development cycles, especially when combined with agile development methodologies.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
